As he delves deeper into the case, he discovers a complex web of tax fraud, money laundering, and corruption that leads him to the highest echelons of power.

The novel is a gripping and suspenseful ride, with plenty of twists and turns to keep you on the edge of your seat. James Swain is a well-known author of crime fiction, and "The Taxman Cometh" is one of his most popular works.

Give it a try, and I hope you enjoy the ride!
